Package org.vast.ogc.gml

Class GMLUtils

java.lang.Object
org.vast.xml.XMLBindingsUtils
org.vast.ogc.gml.GMLUtils
public class GMLUtils extends XMLBindingsUtils

Utility methods to read/write GML documents. This class is not thread-safe.

Since:
Feb 8, 2014

      Parameters:
      timeExtent - TimeExtent object
      forcePeriod - Set to true to force output to be a GML time period
      gmlFactory - GML factory to use to create time primitive objects
      Returns:
      new GML time primitive instance
